theextravagant:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theextravagant:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theextravagant:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theextravagant:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

theextravagant:TranslucentFeather.NAME: Translucent Feather
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat fetch 1 card from your draw pile.

theextravagant:TranscendedFeather.NAME: Transcended Feather
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Translucent Feather. At the start of each combat add 2 #yInvocations to your hand.

theextravagant:RedPhonoblaster.NAME: Red Phonoblaster
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Strength, gain 1 additional Strength and lose 1 Strength at the end of your turn.
